name: Them's Fightin' Herds
descr:
Them’s Fightin’ Herds is a 2D fighting game featuring a cast of adorable animals designed by acclaimed cartoon producer Lauren Faust. Beneath the cute and cuddly surface, a serious fighter awaits![h2][h2]Key Features[/h2][/h2][list][li] [b]Streamlined Combat[/b] - 4-button fighting mechanics, magic system, enhanced super attack, and juggle decay to prevent infinite combos.
[/li][li] [b]Story Mode[/b] - An episodic adventure filled with exploration, combat challenges, minigames, and boss fights! Chapter 1 (starring Arizona) is available now. Additional chapters are in development and will be released as free updates.
[/li][li] [b]Local Versus and Online Crossplay Matchmaking[/b] - Fight opponents offline or battle across the globe with GGPO’s powerful rollback netcode.
[/li][li] [b]Tutorial and Training Modes[/b] – Learn the ropes with combo trials and guided tutorials, practice combos in the data-rich training room, and view replays from your matches!
[/li][li] [b]Pixel Lobby[/b] - Unlock accessories, customize your avatar, and explore a top-down visual lobby with other players online.
[/li][li] [b]Dynamic Music System[/b] - Rockin' battle music adapts to the characters to make every match feel like a clash of champions.[/li][/list]
